What’s the kindest thing you can tell yourself right now?
If you could pause time, what’s the first completely useless thing you’d do?
If you could talk to animals, which one would be the most annoying?
If your thoughts were loud like a podcast, what would today's episode be called?
Is it better to know everything and do nothing, or know nothing and try everything?
Would you rather have one wish now or three wishes 10 years from now?
If you ate yourself, would you become twice as big or disappear entirely?
If my brain was a TV show, what kind of show would it be right now?
If my mind could text me one emoji right now, what would it be?
